home_section_1_small: We have collected all sources of commercial and public tenders for you
home_section_2_comp1_descr: The public procurement website, electronic trading platforms, thousands of company websites and many other sources are constantly tracked and new tenders are added as they appear
home_section_2_comp2_descr: We send new tenders by e-mail with individual mailing settings. Choose a convenient time, frequency and content. Get the purchases that really suit you without spending hours searching
home_section_2_comp3_descr: We will assist you: set up industries, select keywords for high-quality and accurate search. You can receive the necessary purchases in one click using the templates
home_section_3_descr: Our operators carefully study the purchased goods and services in the documentation and choose the appropriate industries
home_section_3_comp1_descr: Purchases are accurately classified by 300+ industries and regions
home_section_3_comp2_descr: Classifying by regions only according to the actual place of delivery from the documentation
home_section_3_comp3_descr: Purchases with errors in the subject ('building construction') â€” will fall into the right industry
home_section_3_comp4_descr: Ambiguous purchases are classified according to the technical task from the documents
home_section_4_descr: Explore ttender, or create an account instantly and place a tender. You can also contact us for assistance!
